categories: Category:Sith Lords of the reconstituted Sith Empire

nodes.text: Izar was a Force-sensitive male Sith Lord who served as representative among the Imperial Outreach Division. Shortly before the Dantooine Incursion, Izar contacted Lana Beniko to get in touch with the Commander of the Eternal Alliance.

Izar was a quite charismatic Sith Lord who often showered his conversation partners with compliments.
He also held the traditional ways of the Empire in a quite high esteem.
Izar contacts The Commander if the player is Imperial.
